stories.title: Shadow Realm

chapters.title: The First Door
content: The air was cold, even though the sun was still alive in the sky.
A strange door stood in the middle of the forest, untouched by time.
And he knewâ€¦ opening it would change everything.

chapters.title: Whispers in the Dark
content: The moment the door opened, silence collapsed into whispers.
Not human voices. Not animal sounds.

stories.title: Vortix Chronicles
stories.description: A futuristic story where technology becomes emotion and reality bends through digital consciousness.

chapters.title: The Signal
content: The screen blinked with a signal that should not exist.
And the world started to rewrite itself.
